c74object.name: abc.puckettespaf~
c74object.description:
abc.puckettespaf~consists in a two-cosine carrier signal multiplied by a waveshaping pulse generator. The central frequency cf (Hz) is bordered by two successive multiples of the fundamental frequency f0 (Hz). The bandwith parameter (bw, in Hz) controls the width of the central peak in the spectrum of the PAF generator.
Two waveshaping functions are provided: either Gaussian (wf = 0) or Cauchy (wf = 1). They are respectively controlled by sigma and a parameters.
PAF synthesis is a basis to generate variable spectra on a pair of harmonics to build formants that enable to create sound close to sung vowels thanks to formants.
'abc.puckettespaf~ @mode 2' object adds the possibility of inharmonic generation by adding a variable phase to the driving phasor controlled by two parameters: ifreq (Hz) and iamp (between 0 and 1).
This implementation is based on the paper of Miller Puckett: https://msp.ucsd.edu/techniques/v0.11/book-html/node96.html.

attribute.name: mode
attribute.description: sets the mode of puckettespaf. '@mode 2' allows inharmonic generation [init=1:min=1:max=2:step=1]..

attribute.name: a
attribute.description: controls the waveshape when wf=0 (Gaussian mode). [init=1:min=0.001:max=100:step=0.001]
attribute.digest: controls the waveshape when wf=0 (Gaussian mode)

attribute.name: bw
attribute.description: sets the width of the central peak in the spectrum. [init=50:min=0.001:max=5000:step=0.001]
attribute.digest: sets the width of the central peak in the spectrum

attribute.name: cf
attribute.description: sets the central frequency in Hz. cf is bordered by two successive multiples of the fundamental frequency f0. [init=500:min=20:max=20000:step=0.001]
attribute.digest: sets the central frequency in Hz

attribute.name: f0
attribute.description: sets the fundamental frequency in Hz. [init=220:min=20:max=20000:step=0.001]
attribute.digest: sets the fundamental frequency in Hz

attribute.name: sigma
attribute.description: controls the waveshape when wf=1 (Cauchy mode). [init=1:min=0.001:max=5:step=0.001]

attribute.name: wf
attribute.description: sets the waveshaping mode. 0 uses the Gaussian function, 1 uses Cauchy function

attribute.name: ifreq
attribute.description: sets the frequency of the variable phase for 'abc.puckettespaf~ 2' in Hz. [init=0.1:min=0:max=1000:step=0.001]
attribute.digest: sets the frequency of the variable phase for 'abc.puckettespaf~ 2'

attribute.name: iamp
attribute.description: sets the amplitude of the variable phase for 'abc.puckettespaf~ 2'. [init=0:min=0:max=1:step=0.001]
attribute.digest: sets the amplitude of the variable phase for 'abc.puckettespaf~ 2'
